info.description: The SymDump REST API ABEND diagnostics tool.
info.title: SymDump Rest API

get.description: Display the current product installation options.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Basic Auth (with mainframe username and password)

get.description: Display a list of ABEND reports.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Basic Auth (with mainframe username and password)

parameters.name: prtlib
parameters.description: Dump repository data set name

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Basic Auth (with mainframe username and password)

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Report key is used to locate a specific report from the report list.

parameters.name: prtlib
parameters.description: Dump repository data set name

400.description: Invalid key, no corresponding report found.

get.description: Retrieve an ABEND analysis report with an index.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Basic Auth (with mainframe username and password)

parameters.name: dumpIndexRequest
parameters.description: Request body

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Report key is used to locate a specific report from the report list

parameters.name: prtlib
parameters.description: Dump repository data set name

400.description:
Invalid key, no corresponding report found.
When you populate a non LE-enabled ASSEMBLER option, the ndvrDSSdsn option data set name of a PROTSYM file is required.
Values to populate a non LE-enabled ASSEMBLER option are 'Y' or 'N'.

post.description: Lock an ABEND report to prevent accidental deletion.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Basic Auth (with mainframe username and password)

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Report key is used to locate a specific report from the report list

parameters.name: prtlib
parameters.description: Dump repository data set name

400.description:
Invalid key, no corresponding report found.
Report is already locked.

get.description: View formatting options for a report.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Basic Auth (with mainframe username and password)

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Report key is used to locate a specific report from the report list

parameters.name: prtlib
parameters.description: Dump repository data set name

400.description: Invalid key, no corresponding report found.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Basic Auth (with mainframe username and password)

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Report key is used to locate a specific report from the report list

parameters.name: prtlib
parameters.description: Dump repository data set name

parameters.name: reportOptionsRequest
parameters.description: Request body

400.description:
Invalid key, no corresponding report found.
Locked report options cannot be updated.
<option_name> value exceeds the maximum size <size>.

post.description: Unlock an ABEND report to allow deletion.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Basic Auth (with mainframe username and password)

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Report key is used to locate a specific report from the report list

parameters.name: prtlib
parameters.description: Dump repository data set name

400.description:
Invalid key, no corresponding report found.
Report is not locked.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Basic Auth (with mainframe username and password)

parameters.name: protdmp
parameters.description: Dump repository data set name

first128.description: Display only the first 128 bytes of each record.

linecnt.description: The number of lines per formatted page.

linkage.description: Display the Linkage Section for COBOL programs.

listline.description: The number of additional source lines to display before and after the abending (or snap) statement.

localstor.description: Display Local Storage for COBOL programs.

memmap.description: Display the TGT, DSA and PGT memory maps.

savearea.description: Display the Save Area Trace report.

showheap.description: Display LE or PL/I heap storage.

workstor.description: Display the Working Storage for COBOL programs.

protsymList.description: list of PROTSYM data set names.

binfrmt.description: Display binary values as decimal or hexadecimal.

mergedb.description: Merge symbolic names onto Database reports.

mrgauto.description: Merge symbolic names onto PL/I automatic storage.

mrgbased.description: Merge symbolic names onto PL/I based variable storage.

mrgcntld.description: Merge symbolic names onto PL/I controlled storage.

mrgdsect.description: Merge symbolic names onto Assembler DSECT storage.

mrgfiles.description: Merge symbolic names onto File Section for COBOL.

mrglink.description: Merge symbolic names onto Linkage Section for COBOL.

mrglocal.description: Merge symbolic names onto Local Storage for COBOL.

mrgparms.description: Merge symbolic names onto PL/I parameter storage.

mrgstat.description: Merge symbolic names onto PL/I static storage.

mrgwork.description: Merge symbolic names onto Working Storage for COBOL.

occurs.description: Number of table elements to display for each array.

ndvrDSSasm.description: Activates or deactivates auto population for non-LE enabled ASSEMBLER programs.

ndvrDSSdsn.description: The data set name of a PROTSYM file designated as the receiver of Dynamic Symbolic Support auto population. Specify this option to activate Dynamic Symbolic Support for CA Endevor SCM.
